___noIndexBuildRetry.description: Do not retry any index builds that were interrupted by shutdown

___jsonp.description: Allow JSONP access via http (has security implications)

___smallfiles.description: Use a smaller default file size

___nojournal.description: disable journaling (journaling is on by default for 64 bit)

___directoryperdb.description: Each database will be stored in a separate directory

___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each MongoDB task

___instances.description: Number of MongoDB instances to run

___location.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting MongoDB data. The final location will be derived from this value plus the name set in `name` (e.g. `/mnt/host_volume/mongodb`). Note that this path must be the same on all DCOS agents

___role.description: Deploy MongoDB only on nodes with this role

___disk.description: Disk (MB) to allocate to each MongoDB instance

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each MongoDB instance

___enable.description: Whether to use BRIDGE networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is false and HOST mode networking is used.

___http_port.description: HTTP Port if general.httpinterface is enabled
